properties.description: The 'Community Cuppa' and 'Chinwag' events are aimed at those aged 65+ and alternate to ensure a regular monthly event. The Cuppa is a pop in, where you are welcome to enjoy some refreshments and company. The Chinwag is the same but with added entertainment (normally a singer).

properties.address: 8 Market Place, Bungay NR35 1AW, UK
properties.description: Organised by Bungay Community Support. An opportunity to meet others, chat over tea and biscuits and get involved with optional activities. There's always a warm welcome! We'll also have advice and support on hand from our partner organisations. We're also establishing a food hall so that residents can access free/discounted food in the New Year. We aim to move to our new Community Hub (old Grooms Butchers in Wingfield Street) as soon as we can
properties.title: WARM SPACES - Bungay Warm Rooms

properties.address: Roman Road, Lowestoft NR32 2DQ, UK
properties.description: The Warm Space is open to anyone, all welcome. There is no charge for refreshments at the Warm Space. Between 11.30 - 13.30 we also have a brunch cafe available. We are supported by Lowestoft Town Council and East Suffolk Council who subsidise our work.

properties.description: WARM WEDNESDAYS. Throughout the months of winter we will be offering a warm place to come during the hours of 3-5pm for a free tea or coffee, offering the Community a place to come and sit by the fire, get warm, relax and chat to our friendly team. Please quote “Warm Wednesday” at the bar for a free cup of something hot.

properties.description: The activity room will be a Warm Room; to provide a safe, welcoming space, with hot drinks for anyone struggling with heating costs during the colder winter months. With special thanks to East Suffolk Council for helping us deliver this.
